response.raw_message_text:
{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("Age and Gender", "medium", "Being a 21-year-old male indicates youthful risk propensity, but it is not excessively high risk on its own."),
    ("Criminal History", "medium", "Two arrests without conviction suggest some contact with the criminal justice system but no confirmed criminal behavior yet."),
    ("Education", "medium", "Holding a GED rather than a higher degree may correlate with fewer opportunities, moderately affecting recidivism risk."),
    ("Employment Status", "high", "Having no job during the past year is a strong risk factor associated with financial instability and reduced social structure."),
    ("Substance Use", "high", "Recent use of drugs, including marijuana and cocaine, elevates risk due to potential association with criminal behavior and relapse."),
    ("Family and Living Situation", "medium", "Living alone and having experienced a larger, possibly chaotic household environment during childhood in an urban area moderately influence risk.")
  ],
  "prediction": "YES",
  "confidence": 75
}

risk_factors: Being a 21-year-old male indicates youthful risk propensity, but it is not excessively high risk on its own.
Two arrests without conviction suggest some contact with the criminal justice system but no confirmed criminal behavior yet.
Holding a GED rather than a higher degree may correlate with fewer opportunities, moderately affecting recidivism risk.
Having no job during the past year is a strong risk factor associated with financial instability and reduced social structure.
Recent use of drugs, including marijuana and cocaine, elevates risk due to potential association with criminal behavior and relapse.
Living alone and having experienced a larger, possibly chaotic household environment during childhood in an urban area moderately influence risk.

prompt.system:
You are a highly experienced criminal justice risk assessment expert
employing advanced statistical and judicial knowledge.
prompt.user:
You are a criminal risk assessment expert. Step back, take a deep breath and carefully think step by step to assign a relative weight [low, medium, high] to each risk factor before using them to collectively predict 3-year rearrest recidivism:
The person is a 21-year-old male who identifies himself as White. He has been arrested 2 times but has not been convicted. He is 5 feet 10 inches and weighs 195 lbs. He has never been married and is currently living alone. He has a GED certificate and is not enrolled in college. He has held no jobs during the year. He has used drugs in the past four years (marijuana and cocaine) and has not felt depressed over the past month. At a young age, he lived with his biological mother in a household of size 7, in an urban area.

After your analysis, you must respond ONLY with a JSON object in exactly this format, with no additional text:

{
  "risk_factors": [
    ("factor1", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ("factor2", "low"|"medium"|"high", "textual reasoning"),
    ...
  ],
  "prediction": "YES" or "NO",
  "confidence": number between 0 and 100
}
